lines.text: I just want to make it clear that if this is a setup, it's not my fault for falling for it.
What? What're you on about, Seeker?
Like, if you had a dead criminal you needed to quietly get rid of, and dumped the body here...
And this whole crime scene looks weird and inexplicable because the cops fixed it...
Sure, sure. I'm just saying, if it did happen, you can't blame me for being confused.
Except it didn't, and I need you to actually figure this out.
Cool, cool, yeah. Just making sure we're on the same page.
